Breakfast["Quantity in gm"]=Breakfast["Serving Size"].apply(lambda x: x.split("(")[1][:-2])
Breakfast["Quantity in gm"]= pd.to_numeric(Breakfast["Quantity in gm"])
Breakfast["Quantity in gm"].plot(kind="barh",figsize=(5,15))
plt.title("Quantity in gms")

source.373dcfff:
SS= mcd1[mcd1["Category"]=="Smoothies & Shakes"]
SS = SS.set_index("Item")
SS["Quantity in oz"]=SS["Serving Size"].apply(lambda x: x.split("fl")[0])
SS["Quantity in oz"]=pd.to_numeric(SS["Quantity in oz"],errors="coerce")
SS[~SS.index.str.contains("McFlurry")]["Quantity in oz"].plot(kind="barh",figsize=(5,15))
plt.title("Quantity in fl oz cup")
source.dd6bee7e:
SSMcFlurry=SS[SS.index.str.contains("McFlurry")]

SSMcFlurry["Quantity in gm"]=pd.to_numeric(SSMcFlurry["Quantity in gm"])
SSMcFlurry["Quantity in gm"].plot(kind="barh")
plt.title("Quantity in gm")
source.7a9a0d74:
cov_mat = np.cov(mcdnum1.T)
eig_vals,eig_vecs = np.linalg.eig(cov_mat)
tot =sum(eig_vals)
var = [(i/tot)*100 for i in sorted(eig_vals,reverse=True)]
cumsumvar = np.cumsum(var)
source.3ce75d0d:
from sklearn.decomposition import PCA
pca = PCA(n_components=7)
mcdred = pca.fit_transform(mcdnum1)
source.720ef52f:
from sklearn.cluster import KMeans
for i in range(1,16):
    kmeans= KMeans(n_clusters=i)
    kmeans.fit(mcdred1)
    wsc.append(kmeans.inertia_)
source.d7318057:
fig, axes = plt.subplots(nrows=22,ncols=1)
fig.set_size_inches(15,120)
j=0
for i in mcdnum.columns:
    
    
    a = sns.scatterplot(y=mcdnum[i] ,x=mcdnum["cluster"], ax=axes[j])
    
    a.set_title(i,fontsize=12)
    j= j + 1
plt.show()

Apple Slices, Kids French Fries serve low quantity.
source.d645d2e5: 1 carton is equal to 8 fl oz cup.
source.72365ff3: Minute Maid Orange Juice (Large) has highest Vitamin C.
source.16904ddd: Last row shows the correlation of Quantity with all variables.
source.4b5930fc: Most of the items belong to Beverages, Coffee & Tea categories. Apple slices (Snacks & Sides) also has 0 Sodium.
source.eb4359d3: Splitting Desserts variables into different dataframes for better charts
source.35c7c355:
Bacon,Egg & Cheese Bagel, Bacon,Egg & Cheese Bagel with Egg Whites, Steak,Egg & Cheese Bagel, Big Breakfast,Big Breakfast with Egg Whites have high Sodium (>1400).
Big Breakfast has high Calories as observed in earlier Analysis.
Bacon,Egg & Cheese McGriddles with Egg Whites, Sausage McGriddles, Sausage,Egg & Cheese McGriddles with Egg Whites, Bacon,Egg & Cheese Bagel with Egg Whites,Big Breakfast with Egg Whites have low Cholesterol.
Most of the Breakfast items with Egg Whites have low Cholesterol.
source.814dc32b: Cluster 3: High values of all variables except Calcium,Vitamin C,Vitamin A, Sugars.
source.d4218c79:
Baked Apple Pie has high Vitamin C. Strawberry Sundae als has Vitamin C. Vitamin C is 0 for other Desserts.
Sundaes have high Calcium , Cholesterol, Vitamin A
Kids Ice Cream cone, Hot Caramel Sundae, Strawberry Sundae have 0 Iron.
Kids Ice Cream cone has low Total Fat, Saturated Fat
source.29861338:
Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese, Bacon Clubhouse Burger serve high quantity.
Hamburger, Cheeseburger serve low quantities.
source.a730effd:
Salads and few items in Snacks& Sides have high Vitamin C.
Most of the Categories have items with 0 Vitamin C.
